item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row column_spacing="40" tablet_fullwidth_cols="yes" center_row="yes" bg_style="stretch" el_id="home-content" css=".vc_custom_1489889641705{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Free Updates & Support" icon="ticon ticon-refresh" icon_color_accent="true" heading_type="h2" icon_size="28px" heading_size="16px" container_left_padding="50px"]Not only do you get aclean and well coded WordPress theme, but also the support you deserve.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Highly Customizable" icon="ticon ticon-cubes" icon_color_accent="true" heading_type="h2" icon_size="28px" heading_size="16px" container_left_padding="60px"]Total was developed with child theming in mind, but there are also tons ofbuilt-in optionsfor customizing it.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box heading="Drag & Drop Page Builder" icon="ticon ticon-file-text-o" icon_color_accent="true" heading_type="h2" icon_size="28px" container_left_padding="50px" heading_size="16px"]Total comes with an easy drag and drop editor via the Visual Composer making it easy to setup new sites in no time![/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" remove_bottom_col_margin="true" bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1519951458397{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-top-color: #ededed !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #ededed !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="Top Selling WordPress Theme" tag="h2" font_weight="normal" text_align="center" font_size="32px" css=".vc_custom_1476676622414{padding-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_text text_align="center" font_weight="300" color="#777777" font_size="18px"]Total is our most advanced, best selling and highest rated theme to date.
Everything you would expect and more from one of the most popular WordPress related websites out there![/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing][vcex_button url="https://total.wpexplorer.com/" title="Why Choose Total" font_weight="400" font_size="15px" icon_right_padding="5px" align="center"]Why Choose Total ?[/vcex_button][vcex_spacing][vc_single_image image="4215" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin="true" bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1519951496523{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="Amazing Theme Features" tag="h2" font_weight="normal" text_align="center" font_size="32px" css=".vc_custom_1476676634350{padding-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_text text_align="center" font_weight="300" color="#777777" font_size="18px"]We've built-in tons of amazing theme features to make it possible for you to createthe website of your dreams. On top of that our Total framework is fast, flexible and SEO optimized.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="50" bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1519951584374{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Drag & Drop Builder" heading_type="h3" heading_size="16px" image="4332"]Easily build and save layouts using a drag & drop page builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your posts and pages, no need to memorize a bunch of shortcodes.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="default" bg_style="stretch" border_style="solid"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Responsive Design" heading_type="h3" heading_size="16px" image="4333"]The Total theme is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device, even on their phones![/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="90+ Builder Blocks" heading_size="16px" image="4334"]Included are 90+ modules to choose from to insert into your posts/pages so you can create amazing layouts. And more added all the time with updates![/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40" bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1519951579707{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Advanced Theme Customizer" heading_type="h3" heading_size="16px" image="4335"]An intuitive, powerfulextended version of theWordPress LiveCustomizeris included so you can change tons of features likeyour site colors, container widths and more on the fly![/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="default" bg_style="stretch" border_style="solid"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Custom Post Types" heading_type="h3" heading_size="16px" image="4337"]The built-in custom post types for portfolios, testimonials and staff make it easy to add & manage content. Just use builder elements to insert them anywhere.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Premium Sliders" heading_type="h3" heading_size="16px" image="4339"]Bundled with this theme are two of the best premium sliders available, LayerSlider & Slider Revolution (a $37 total value for FREE), to create epic sliders for your site.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row column_spacing="40" bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1519951532523{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="WooCommerce Compatible" heading_type="h3" heading_size="16px" image="4336"]Built-in support for the WooCommerce plugin allows you to sell products on your site. Everything has been designed & extended to fit perfectly with the theme.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" style="default" bg_style="stretch" border_style="solid"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="SEO Optimized" heading_type="h3" heading_size="16px" image="4338"]Weve paid close attention to SEO while developing this theme (headings, clean code, speed, etc). Your site must look good, but also rank well on search results.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Cross-Browser Compatible" heading_type="h3" heading_size="16px" image="4340"]With Total you dont have to worry if your site works with a specific browser, weve gone ahead and tested the theme with all major browsers to be sure it looks great![/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" remove_bottom_col_margin="true" bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1519951644788{border-top-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-top-color: #ededed !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="Best Rated Theme" tag="h2" font_weight="normal" text_align="center" font_size="32px" css=".vc_custom_1476676652622{padding-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_text text_align="center" font_weight="300" color="#777777" font_size="18px"]People just can't stop talking about the Total WordPress Theme.
Have a look at the reviews from some of the many happy customers.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing][vc_column_text]

[font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="#555"][font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="#666"][font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="#777"][font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="#888"][font_awesome icon="star" size="24px" margin_right="5px" color="#999"]

[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" css=".vc_custom_1489885544865{border-top-width: 0px !important;border-right-width: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 0px !important;padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;border-left-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Spend less time coding & more time building

Total comes with the Visual Composer plugin built-in so you can easily create your pages using drag and drop right in your post editor. You don't have to be a web designer to create epic and unique layouts![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image css_animation="right-to-left" image="4220" alignment="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" css=".vc_custom_1489885549520{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_spacing visibility="visible-desktop"][vc_single_image css_animation="left-to-right" image="3144"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Responsive, Mobile-Friendy Design

These days it is more important then ever to provided your users with a website that they can use not only at home but also on the go. That's why the Total WordPress theme is fully responsive and mobile friend. Resize the browser so you can see the responsiveness in action![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" css=".vc_custom_1489885632851{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 0px !important;padding-top: 65px !important;padding-bottom: 65px !important;background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;border-left-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Powerful Admin Panel

The Total WordPress theme makes use of the powerfulVisual Composer Page Builderfor all of it's page buildingoptions. But that's not all! Total also uses a custom extendedWordPress Live Customizer for tons of styling options.Quickly and easily customize various parts of your site such as colors, layout, header, image cropping sizes and much more![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_spacing visibility="visible-desktop"][vc_single_image css_animation="right-to-left" image="3143"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" typography_style="light" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" css=".vc_custom_1489885629307{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 0px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;background-color: #4a97c2 !important;border-left-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_spacing size="20px" visibility="visible-desktop"][vc_video link="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RAx19sZy-g4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Create Your Layout

When it comes to your site you should have control over the layout. The Total WordPress theme includes options for boxed or full-width layouts as well as there are built-in options to control the widths of your content so even though the default content width for the desktop is 980px you can make it whatever you want! There are also built-in options to control the widths of your site at the different responsive sizes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" css=".vc_custom_1489885642517{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 0px !important;padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;border-left-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e8e8e8 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Elite Author

When you have the choice why go with a new author? Choose an Elite! We've been selling themes for years and over that time we've learned exactly what it is you are looking for and need for your site, so we provide it! From a strong, well coded framework to great support.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image css_animation="right-to-left" image="3903" alignment="right"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_style="stretch" video_bg_overlay="none" css=".vc_custom_1489885665240{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_spacing size="15px" visibility="visible-desktop"][vc_single_image css_animation="left-to-right" image="4216"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Strong, Well-Coded Framework

We've spent a long time building this theme and making sure every aspect is well coded and clean so if you are a developer you can easily tweak your theme to better suit your needs. All the code is commented out so you know exactly what the PHP is there for (in plain English) and there are various filters and "overwritable" functions making child-theming a dream come true![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Login
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_heading text="Custom Login Form" color="#444444"][vcex_spacing size="15px"][vc_column_text]Easily insert a login form on any page of your sitevia the visual Composer page builder to allow people to log into your WordPress site. You can use a plugin to redirect people to your custom login page. This can also be good for security reasons.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_login_form remember="false" lost_password="false" register="false"]You are currently logged in[/vcex_login_form][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Homepage 2
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" full_height="yes" css=".vc_custom_1546290897516{background-image: url(https://total.wpexplorer.com/base/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/revslider/slider_9/video-bg.jpg?id=4492) !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="We Are Total." tag="h1" font_weight="300" text_align="center" font_size="d:72|tl:72|tp:72|pl:48|pp:48" color="#ffffff"][vcex_heading text="The only WordPress theme you'll ever need." bottom_margin="30px" tag="h2" color="#ffffff" font_weight="normal" text_align="center" font_size="24"][vcex_button url="https://total.wpexplorer.com/" target="blank" size="large" align="center" color="white" style="outline" border_radius="9999px" icon_right="ticon ticon-chevron-circle-right"]Learn More[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin="true" css=".vc_custom_1609887932417{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="Welcome to Total" tag="h2" font_weight="300" text_align="center" font_size="36px" css=".vc_custom_1476676425840{padding-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_text text_align="center" font_size="16px"]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vivamus lobortis mauris orci, vel elementum massa posuere nec. Etiam consectetur nunc id enim ultrices, ultrices luctus ipsum blandit. Phasellus sit amet augue tellus. Nulla facilisi. Pellentesque elementum est augue, non blandit erat ullamcorper id. Suspendisse iaculis hendrerit condimentum.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1609887917883{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Custom Builder Blocks" icon="cubes" heading_type="h2" icon_size="42px"]

The Visual Composer is a great plugin, but combined with the Total theme it is out of this world! We've extended the builder to bring you many unique and highly customizable modules.

[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Efficient & Clean Code" icon="code" heading_type="h2" icon_size="42px"]

We take pride in coding quality themes, we don't "steal" any code or take any shortcuts. We also keep our themes updated constantly to ensure everything is as well optimized as it can be.

[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Custom Skins" icon="magic" heading_type="h2" icon_size="42px"]

Easily change your site design with a click of a button in the advanced skins dashboard of the Total Theme. You can even create your own skins via a child theme or plugin!

[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin="true" css=".vc_custom_1609887966244{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="Our Team" tag="h2" font_weight="300" text_align="center" font_size="36px" css=".vc_custom_1476676432478{padding-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_text text_align="center" font_size="16px"]Meet our awesome team. We searched high and low for people who were highly qualified with years of experience in their fields. Checkout their bios to learn more about the staff you will be working with.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="40px"][wpex_post_cards post_types="staff" posts_per_page="6" card_style="staff_1" thumbnail_filter="grayscale"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" remove_bottom_col_margin="true" css=".vc_custom_1609886469428{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}"][vc_column margin_bottom="0px"][vcex_heading text="Client Testimonials" bottom_margin="25px" tag="h2" font_weight="300" text_align="center" font_size="36px"][wpex_post_cards display_type="carousel" post_types="testimonials" posts_per_page="3" thumbnail_size="testimonials_entry" arrows_position="center" items="1" auto_height="true" card_style="testimonial_1" arrows_style="slim" thumbnail_filter="grayscale" el_class="wpex-text-lg"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin="true" css=".vc_custom_1609887977437{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="Our Work" tag="h2" font_weight="300" text_align="center" font_size="36px" css=".vc_custom_1476676457947{padding-bottom: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_text text_align="center" font_size="16px"]Checkout some of our finished projects. We worked hard on these, and we think it shows. item.title: Toggle Bar
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Welcome

Say hello to the toggle bar. This is an optional section you can use to display any content you'd like. Simply select a page from the theme panel and the content of the page will display here. You can even use the drag and drop builder to create this! This is a perfect place for your company mission statement, alerts, notices or anything else.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing][vc_column_text]Get In Touch[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vcex_list_item icon="ticon ticon-envelope" text_align="textleft" margin_right="10px" url_target="self" color="#2c87f0"]Email: support@total.com[/vcex_list_item][vcex_list_item icon="ticon ticon-phone-square" text_align="textleft" color="#2c87f0" margin_right="10px" url_target="self"]Phone: 1-800-Total-Theme[/vcex_list_item][vcex_list_item icon="ticon ticon-map-marker" text_align="textleft" color="#2c87f0" margin_right="10px" url_target="self"]Address: Las Vegas, Nevada[/vcex_list_item][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Our Location[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing][vc_single_image image="4330"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
